dc_description_s: New York Port Autority Rail Lines, 2009 is a line theme representing parts of the Port Authority Trans-Hudson Corporation (PATH) rapid-transit system between New York and New Jersey and the AirTrain JFK light rail system.  PATH data include lines run by the Port Authority and were digitized based on printed Port Authority documents.  These data were projected for use with the Community Cartography New York City datasets and an accompanying point file of Path and AirTrain rail stations.
dc_title_s: New York Port Autority Rail Lines, 2009
